languages.text: "Мы заслужили это право жертвами и служением. И покорно примем смерть, если Домин решит, что ткачи более не нужны флагману".

traits.locale_text: "Мы заслужили это право жертвами и служением. И покорно примем смерть, если Домин решит, что ткачи более не нужны флагману".

languages.text: "We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."
languages.original_text: "Мы заслужили это право жертвами и служением. И покорно примем смерть, если Домин решит, что ткачи более не нужны флагману".

traits.locale_text: "We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."
"We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."
"We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."

"We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."

languages.text: «Nos hemos ganado este derecho a través del sacrificio y el servicio. Y aceptaremos la muerte con humildad si {mf|el|la} Domin decide que la nave insignia ya no necesita a los tejedores».
languages.original_text: "We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."

languages.text: 「我らは犠牲と奉仕によって、この権利を得てきました。そして、もしドミンが織り手はもはや旗艦に必要ないと判断するのであれば、我らは謙虚に死を受け入れるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."

languages.text: “我们是通过牺牲与侍奉才赢得了这样的权利。如果秘者不再需要织网者，那我们也会谦卑地接受死亡。”
languages.original_text: "We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."

languages.text: "Wir haben uns dieses Recht durch Opfer und treue Dienste verdient. Und wir werden den Tod demütig akzeptieren, wenn {mf|der|die} Domin beschließen sollte, dass die Spinner vom Flaggschiff nicht mehr gebraucht werden."
languages.original_text: "We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."

languages.text: « Nous avons gagné ce droit par le sacrifice et le service. Si {mf|le|la} Domin estime que les tisseurs n'ont plus leur place sur le vaisseau amiral, nous accepterons humblement la mort. »
languages.original_text: "We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."
"We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."

languages.text: "Fedakârlığımız ve hizmetimiz üzerinden bu hakkı kazandık. Domin'in sancak gemisinde dokurlara artık ihtiyacı olmadığına karar vermesi durumunda da ölüm tüm içtenliğimizle kabul ederiz."
languages.original_text: "We have earned this right through sacrifice and service. And we will humbly accept death if the Domin decides that the spinners are no longer needed by the flagship."
